Pebble
A lightweight, open source, Java EE blogging tool
SourceForge.net project page | Home | pebble-user mailing list
Download
  • Current stable release : Pebble 2.6.2
  • Latest code : /trunk on open.jira.com
Documentation
The documentation here is focussed around getting Pebble installed, configured and running. User documentation is integrated with the Pebble web application and can be accessed by clicking "Help" after logging in.
  • Installation
  • Configuration
  • Single-blog vs multi-blog
  • Security
  • Screenshots
  • Upgrading from 2.x
  • Upgrading from 1.x

Project Mailing Lists

These are the mailing lists that have been established for this project. For each list, there is a subscribe, unsubscribe, and an archive link.

Pebble is written by Simon Brown and maintained by James Roper and many contributors
